question: Prayer. Fasting. Daily Bible Reading, Stewardship, Solitude, and Worship are:

a1.text: Essential to my life as a follower of Jesus

a2.text: Important in the life of a follower of Jesus, but I am not consistent with them

a3.text: A good idea, I do some of them sometimes

a4.text: Somebody else's idea of busy Christian stuaff
